clean_data: IT Security Business Continuity Analyst span lITspan span lSecurityspan amp Business Continuity span lAnalystspan IT Security Business Continuity Analyst RCCG Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience IT Security Business Continuity Analyst RCCG Arlington TX August 2017 to Present Currently works as an Information Security Specialist driving information security analysis risk mitigation and security project management initiatives within the IT team As a key business enabler reporting to the head of IT Governance Risk and compliance provides oversight of the organization business continuity and disaster recovery plans for the ongoing improvement of Information Security and continuity of operations for the business areas Develops IT Security policies and procedures and provide information security risk analysis and strategic recommendations for the ongoing improvement of Information Security within IT department Conducts risk analysis and presents recommendations to management and stakeholders Develops and manage network security program metrics and performance through trackingreporting and active engagement with stakeholders for continuous service improvement Implements security improvements by assessing baseline evaluating trends and anticipating requirements Acts as point of contact to executive leadership for dimensioning managing and driving remediation of information security risks Develops and provides information security awareness programs Performs periodic network scan and develops mitigation plans Develops maintains and implements business  and disaster recoveryDR strategies and solutions including risk assessments business impact analyses strategy selection and documentation of business continuity and disaster recovery procedures Plans conducts and manages regular mockdisaster exercises to test the adequacy of existing plans and strategies including regular update of the DRBCP plans Acts as a coordinator for continuity efforts and provides training on Business Continuity techniques Evaluates and provides inputs to the executive management on budget requirements for the execution of BC activities Provides oversight of business continuity testing for key business functionsdepartments and reports on the effectiveness of the department testing and recovery capabilities Works with IT and business functions to develop emergency management plans for recovery decision making and communications continuity of critical departmental processes or temporary shutdown of noncritical departments to ensure continuity of operation and governance Performs periodic review of organization disaster recovery crisis management or business continuity plans Prepares and delivers written and oral presentation to all levels of management on changes to the overall BCPDR plans Network Security AnalystPenetration Tester Kingsbrook Group Inc February 2016 to July 2017 Performed security analysis and identified potential vulnerabilities in the key derivation function Performed vulnerability scan using Nessus to identify and understand exploits vulnerabilities and threats Captured live packet using Wireshark to examine security flaws in the network and developed mitigation risk plans Served as a key IT Consultant for standardization and mapping of federal laws rules regulations and frameworks to internal control documentation from the Federal Financial Institution Exam Council FFIEC Office of the Comptroller of Currency OCC The Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System FRS and Control Objectives and Related Technology COBIT5 Identified vulnerabilities and threats based on security policy and regulatory requirement such as PII PCI HITech HIPAA and SOX Developed cybersecurity policies and best practices to maintain confidentiality integrity and availability of organizational data Performed penetration testing and vulnerability management over enterprise systems to audit the standard to comply with NIST COBIT COSO and ISO 2700x standards Prepared comprehensive security report detailing identifications risk description and recommendations with the code snippets for the vulnerability Coordinated with development team to ensure closure of reported vulnerabilities by explaining the ease of exploitation and the impact of the issue Educated and Trained employees periodically about Cyber Security and how to safeguard enterprise data IT Compliance Risk Specialist TAC North America Irving TX March 2014 to May 2016 Used vulnerability assessment management malware protection and analysis to mitigate organizational cyber attacks Implemented policies and standards based on COBIT 5 ISO 27000 and NIST 80053 Frameworks Continuous Cyber Security monitoring such as running reports and being alerted on unauthorized login attempts etc Ensured that the project life cycle includes considerations for impact on Disaster Recovery Plan DRP Security Risk Assessments SRAs for HIPAA compliance Business Continuity Plan Joint Interface Plan and Meaningful Use reviews for the system with policies procedures and regulatory compliance Advised Information Security and Information Technology team members on regulatory and nonregulatory compliance issues for internal control documentation Prepared summary findings of unmitigated risks or internal control deficiencies to Upper Management Education Bachelors in Information Technology Western Governors University Salt Lake City UT Present Associate of Applied Science in Information Technology Tarrant County College
